alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 3:19AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Cambria and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/safety/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
